clinical_study.brief_title: A Clinical Trial of Thread-embedding Therapy at Acupuncture Point for Simple Obesity
clinical_study.official_title: A Clinical Trial of Acupoint Thread-embedding Therapy for Simple Obesity

lead_sponsor.agency: Shanghai University of Traditional Chinese Medicine

clinical_study.source: Shanghai University of Traditional Chinese Medicine

brief_summary.textblock: Thread-embedding Therapy has been used for treating Obesity in recent years. This research is aimed to observe the clinical effect of thread-embedding therapy in treating Simple Obesity. One hundred patients is planned to be enrolled in the research and receive a thread-embedding therapy. The level of BMI, serum triglyceride, cholesterol and fasting blood glucose will be adopted for evaluation before and after therapy.

detailed_description.textblock: Each participant will receive thread-embedding therapy every two weeks, and eight times in all.Blood test will be taken at the beginning of the first week of the whole therapy, and at the end of the 8th therapy. During the periods of whole therapy, the participants shall follow diets control and physical exercise as the protocol described.

primary_outcome.time_frame: participants will receive Thread-embedding Therapy twice a week lasting for 16 weeks subsequently.8 times in all.
primary_outcome.description: a 5 percent of loss of body weight will be judged as effective
